description: Add Only. If true, will not allow update of an already existing Payment Type object.

Payment_TypeObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Payment_TypeObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Payment_TypeObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Payment_Type_Data.description: The unique identifier for the Payment Type

validation.validation: The Payment Type Name entered has already been used.
validation.description: The Payment Type Name entered has already been used.

Payment_MethodObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Payment_MethodObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Payment_MethodObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Payment_Type_Data.description: Payment Method associated with the Payment Type
